Dimension.@Core.Description: A property holding the key of a dimension in an analytical context

Measure.@Core.Description: A property holding the numeric value of a measure in an analytical context

AccumulativeMeasure.@Core.Description: The measure has non-negative and additive values; it can be used in whole-part charts, e.g. the Donut

RolledUpPropertyCount.@Core.Description: Number of properties in the entity instance that have been aggregated away

DrillURL.@Core.Description:
URL to retrieve more detailed data related to a node of a recursive hierarchy.
            Annotations with this term MUST include a qualifier to select the hierarchy for which the drill URL is provided.

PlanningAction.@Core.Description: Processes or generates plan data. Its logic may have side-effects on entity sets.

AggregatedProperties.@Core.Description: Dynamic properties for aggregate expressions with specified aggregation method defined on the annotated entity type.
AggregatedProperties.@Core.LongDescription:
Other annotations may refer in property paths to dynamic properties declared in any AgrgegatedProperties annotation of the 
            given entity type to leverage the results of the aggregate expression determined in the context of an entity collection of 
            the annotated type.

AggregatedProperty.@Core.Description: Dynamic property for aggregate expression with specified aggregation method defined on the annotated entity type.

Name.@Core.Description: Name of the dynamic property holding the aggregated value.

AggregationMethod.@Core.Description: Name of the standard or custom aggregation method to be applied.

AggregatableProperty.@Core.Description: Property whose values shall be aggregated.

AnalyticalContext.@Core.Description: Collection of properties that define an analytical context

AnalyticalContextType.@Core.Description: Exactly one of `Property` and `DynamicProperty` must be present

Property.@Core.Description: Property that is part of the analytical context

DynamicProperty.@Core.Description: Dynamic property introduced by annotations that is part of the analytical context

Dimension.@Core.Description: The property holds the key of a dimension

Measure.@Core.Description: The property holds the numeric value of a measure

AccumulativeMeasure.@Core.Description: The measure has non-negative and additive values; it can be used in whole-part charts, e.g. the Donut

AggregateEntity.@Core.Description: Function and action for retrieving and updating an aggregate entity
AggregateEntity.@Core.LongDescription:
Transient entities that result from the application of a transformation sequence represent an aggregate of persistent entities (for example, aggregate sales per country and product, as in [OData-Data-Agg-v4.0], first example in simple grouping section). Such a transient entity may be annotated with this term to describe
- a service-defined function import that can be used to retrieve the transient entity in order to `$expand` additional properties
- a service-defined action import that can be used to update the transient entity. This effectively means updating the persistent entities whose aggregate the transient entity represents, how this dis-aggregation happens is defined by the service.

@Core.Example.Description:
Based on the [example model](../examples/Analytics.AggregateEntity-sample.xml).
              The format of the `Aggregate` parameter allows the server to re-create the transient entity
              without storing an identifier, based solely on the parameter value.

Aggregate.@Core.Description: Value that the first parameter of the function or action invocation must have
Aggregate.@Core.LongDescription:
This string value identifies the aggregate that the transient entity represents.
            This value MUST be treated as opaque by the client.

RetrieveFunctionImport.@Core.LongDescription: The function has only one parameter.

UpdateActionImport.@Core.LongDescription:
Action parameters after the first define how the identified aggregate entity is updated,
            they are explained in the action definition in the service metadata.

ExpandableProperties.@Core.Description: Declared navigation properties of the aggregate entity that can be expanded

UpdatableProperties.@Core.Description: Declared properties of the aggregate entity that can be updated with the action
UpdatableProperties.@Core.LongDescription:
If a declared property whose name equals a custom aggregate can be updated, this means updating the
            aggregate value.

Aggregation.CustomAggregate.@Validation.ApplicableTerms@Core.Descrip: Adding a list of other terms that can be annotated to it.
